name: ImportPeopleToCalendar
description:
Import people to your calendar from contact lists.

This tool is used to import individuals from contact lists into your calendar, making it simple to invite them to events and send newsletters. Use this when you need to manage and communicate with attendees efficiently.

parameters.name: people_import_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'infos' with people's details (name, email), 'tag_api_ids' for tags to apply, and 'tag_names' for existing tags.

infos.description: Information about the people you want to import. You can include a name and email. Note that we will not set the name of a user once it has already been set.

tag_api_ids.description: The list of tags to apply to people once you have imported them into your calendar. This can be used to import new members with tags and to tag existing members.

tag_names.description: Note: we will not create tags that do not exist. If you want to use a new tag, create a tag before importing people.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Luma API.
